snippet: Barcelona’s Lionel Messi had his third leg injury of the season, and this time, he needs six to eight weeks to recover, the team said.
abstract: Barcelona defeats Real Betis, 4-1; Barcelona’s Lionel Messi has his third leg injury of the season and this time he needs six to eight weeks to recover.
lead_paragraph: Barcelona’s Lionel Messi had his third leg injury of the season, and this time, he needs six to eight weeks to recover, the team said.
